mapper.insert: insert into daily_agent_analysis( day, appid, guid, tableNum, bindNum, income1, income2, income3, useDiamond, updateTime )values( #{day}, #{appid}, #{guid}, #{dau}, #{tableNum}, #{bindNum}, #{income1}, #{income2}, #{income3}, #{useDiamond}, #{updateTime} );
mapper.select: select * from daily_agent_analysis where appid=#{appid} and day=#{day} and guid = #{guid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily_agent_bind1_analysis ( day, appid, guid, bindNum1, updateTime ) SELECT date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d'), appid, superGuid, COUNT(*), now() FROM userbind_log WHERE superLevel = 1 AND dateDiff( createTime, #{day})=0 GROUP BY appid,superGuid

INSERT INTO daily_agent_bind2_analysis ( day, appid, guid, bindNum2, updateTime ) SELECT date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d'), appid, superGuid, COUNT(*), now() FROM userbind_log WHERE superLevel = 2 AND dateDiff( createTime, #{day})=0 GROUP BY appid,superGuid

INSERT INTO daily_agent_bind3_analysis ( day, appid, guid, bindNum3, updateTime ) SELECT date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d'), appid, superGuid, COUNT(*), now() FROM userbind_log WHERE superLevel = 3 AND dateDiff( createTime, #{day})=0 GROUP BY appid,superGuid

INSERT INTO daily_agent_income1_analysis ( day, appid, guid, income1, updateTime ) SELECT date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d'), appid, superGuid, ifnull(sum(income),0), now() FROM income_log WHERE userLevel=1 and dateDiff( createTime, #{day})=0 GROUP BY appid,superGuid

INSERT INTO daily_agent_income2_analysis ( day, appid, guid, income2, updateTime ) SELECT date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d'), appid, superGuid, ifnull(sum(income),0), now() FROM income_log WHERE userLevel=2 and dateDiff( createTime, #{day})=0 GROUP BY appid,superGuid

INSERT INTO daily_agent_income3_analysis ( day, appid, guid, income3, updateTime ) SELECT date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d'), appid, superGuid, ifnull(sum(income),0), now() FROM income_log WHERE userLevel=3 and dateDiff( createTime, #{day})=0 GROUP BY appid,superGuid

INSERT INTO daily_agent_table_analysis ( day, appid, guid, tableNum, useDiamond, updateTime ) SELECT day, appid, superGuid, COUNT(DISTINCT tableId), SUM(useDiamond), NOW() FROM table_info_log WHERE day=#{day} GROUP BY appid,superGuid
